attributes.action: make it compulsory for VISITORS to wash their hands  before entering a ward.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Before entering a ward, especially with the elderly, it should be made compulsory for visitors not only to use the gel but to wash hands too, as the alcohol gel is not effective against C.Diff

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
